title: paper wallets
extract: A paper wallet is an offline mechanism for storing Bitcoins. ... Images of physical Bitcoins are commonly seen in media coverage in innovative styles, mostly with a 'new look' of the coin and the private key printed either on paper, plastic, or metal.Jul 5, 2018
extract_html: A paper wallet is an offline mechanism for storing Bitcoins. ... Images of physical Bitcoins are commonly seen in media coverage in innovative styles, mostly with a 'new look' of the coin and the private key printed either on paper, plastic, or metal.Jul 5, 2018
